room_title: Escape room "The Mad Hatter" by Escape Strategy in Chicago
review: We did the Mad Hatter room and had a blast. We definitely wasted some time stumped on various riddles, but made it out with 2 minutes left!

room_title: Escape room "The Mad Hatter" by Escape Strategy in Chicago
review: We had so much fun! Curtis was wonderful and made sure all of the special needs for our group was met. The Mad Hatter room was challenging and wonderful. 10/10 would go again! Thank you for such a great experience!

room_title: Escape room "The Mad Hatter" by Escape Strategy in Chicago
review: This was our first escape room and we chose the Mad Hatter. It was very challenging but we had a good time. Staff was helpful with a couple of hints when we got stuck. Kids could not stop grinning when we escaped. Will come back for other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Mad Hatter" by Escape Strategy in Chicago
review: We did the "Mad Hatter" room and it was a GREAT time. Our daughters have done several escape classrooms in school and this was our first experience as a family. We loved it and the staff was incredibly helpful and friendly. Highly recommended.

room_title: Escape room "The Mad Hatter" by Escape Strategy in Chicago
review: We did the Mad Hatter room and LOVED it! It was nice to have something different to do on a Saturday evening. We escaped the room with 5 min to spare! Staff were fun and friendly. Can't wait to try the other two rooms.
